help_welcome.menu: The menu above contains these links:
help_welcome.menu_me_text: Your personal dashboard where you can place whatever functionality you need most.
help_welcome.menu_overview_text: An overview over all functions provided by the MIDATA platform.
help_welcome.menu_config_text: Configure your dashboard and data imports.
help_welcome.menu_research_text: News and announcements about MIDATA, the platform and research projects
help_welcome.answer_questions: In order to get started we recommend that you answer us some questions. We will preconfigure your account based on your answers.

help_setup.description: The answers to the following questions are only used to setup your account according to your needs.
help_setup.question_measures: Which measures do you want to view in the portal?
help_setup.question_devices: Do use any of these devices?
help_setup.come_back: You can always come back and change these settings by visiting the "Help" page.

member_circles.empty: You do not have any circles.

member_othercircles.empty: No MIDATA members share data with you.

yourstudies.empty: You do not participate in any study.

entercode.title: Join a research study by entering a participation code.
entercode.description: Join a study by entering a code:

providers.name: Name
providers.empty: You do not have a registered contact to a healthcare provider.

member_user.trialuser: Your account is currently a trial account with limited functionality.
member_user.studyparticipant: Your account has been set up for participation in a study. Functionality is limited. You may upgrade your user account to a full account.
member_user.memberofcooperative: You are a member of the MIDATA cooperative.
member_user.nonmemberuser: You have a full user account but you are no member of the MIDATA cooperative.
member_user.agb_not_requested: By clicking on the 'Request Contract' button the contract and AGB will be sent to you by letter. Please return the signed AGB to convert this trial account into a full account.
member_user.agb_requested: The AGB and contract have been requested by you. Your request has not been processed by the MIDATA office yet.
member_user.agb_printed: The AGB and contract have been requested by you and should arrive during the next days.
